addonAfter.description: Input with labels, set the post-labels
addonAfter.description_zh: 带标签的 input，设置后置标签

addonBefore.description: Input with a label to set the pre-label
addonBefore.description_zh: 带标签的 input，设置前置标签

allowClear.description: You can click the clear icon to delete the content
allowClear.description_zh: 可以点击清除图标删除内容

bordered.description: Whether there is a border or not

clearIcon.description: Custom clear icon (effective when allowClear is true)
clearIcon.description_zh: 自定义清除图标 （allowClear 为 true 时生效）

disabled.description: Whether the status is disabled or not, the default is false
disabled.description_zh: 是否禁用状态，默认为 false

id.description: Enter the ID of the field

showCount.description: Whether or not to display the number of words

size.description: Control size. Note: The size of the input box in the standard form is limited to 'middle'. Select 'large' 'middle' small
size.description_zh: 控件大小。注：标准表单内的输入框大小限制为 `middle`。可选 `large` `middle` small

type.description: To declare the input type, the same as the type attribute of the native input tag, see: [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input# attribute) (please use '<a-textarea />' instead of 'type="textarea"').
type.description_zh: 声明 input 类型，同原生 input 标签的 type 属性，见：[MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#属性)(请直接使用 `<a-textarea />` 代替 `type="textarea"`)。

v-model:value.description: Enter the contents of the box

events.name: change
events.description: Callback when the content of the input box changes
events.description_zh: 输入框内容变化时的回调
